products.title: Burst Grey Mist Vertical Blind
products.description: The burst grey mist vertical blind is a brilliant grey colour. The fabric has a slight texture to it and as it is a dimout material this helps to gently filter the light passing through it. This light grey colour is great for neutral coloured homes or offices. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Burst Graphite Vertical Blind
products.description: The burst graphite is true to the name as very deep grey-blue colour. The dark tone of this blind is one that works best as a contrast to lighter interiors but could be used in a room of rich browns, reds and gold colours. Be aware that this is a dark toned fabric and can easily be overbearing in the wrong room. Ideal for bathrooms and kitchens, this is a dimout fabric which will filter the light entering your room.

products.title: Burst Pastel Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: The powder blue colour of the burst pastel blue is one to really lift and lighten a room. A colour that works well with pastel colour schemes as well as whites. The burst fabrics are brilliant dimout blinds. They are ideal for bathrooms, living rooms and kitchens. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Pastel Yellow Vertical Blind
products.description: As soft as a yellow can be before it starts drifting into beige territory, this gorgeously chill tone relies on its washed out colour to add a certain flexibility that yellows tend to lack. Perfect for adding a gentle coloured accent to rooms with a more solid colour scheme, it mixes well with browns, blues or greys to soften the tone of the room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Violet Vertical Blind
products.description: Enjoy this bright and vibrant purple colour blind in your home and really make a statement in your window. This blind is sure to get everyone talking with its bright and cheery persona. Being a dimout blind this will gently filter the light coming through your window and will be perfect in your living room, bathroom or kitchen. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Blushed Plum Vertical Blind
products.description: This blushed plum coloured blind is perfect for adding a warmer, purple hue to your home. The plum shade is great for creating a rich and inviting theme in your home. This blind is a dimout fabric, so will help to bathe your room in a warming glow. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Burst Ironmonger Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft grey colour of the burst ironmonger is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and dark greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a dimout material so will gently filter the light making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens and bathrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.description: Say aloha to this beautiful emerald blind that is even better than bobbing in a turquoise green ocean. Can a remote chain of tropical islands stop people from looking into your window? Could a the ocean, no? Well this beautiful fabric can do that with ease, and while it does so it floods the room in a beautiful greeny-teal glow that bathes the soul like the warm waters of the pacific. Combining it with other earthy colours is a sure-fire way of creating a space which heals and relaxes before you return to the stresses and distractions of real life.

products.title: Burst Pacific Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: So rich and classy, you will get sick of talking about the amore pacific blue to your houseguests. They will constantly be remarking about its wealth of colour that dominates the space and compliments neutral and earth-toned spaces. You will try to move the conversation onto your weekend plans but they will interrupt you mid-sentence with a surprised exclamation as the sun is blocked fully by this blackout blinds amazing ability.

products.title: Burst Beacon Fire Vertical Blind
products.description: Energetic and intense, the burnt beacon fire blind has one passion in life: being orange. And it is amazing at it. Pairing well with both neutral tones, or if you are feeling a little bolder; blues and teals, it is as versatile as it is refreshing. Being only a dimout blind, the burnt orange will block direct sunlight but allow enough through that you can still marvel in amazement at just how wonderfully orange it is.

products.title: Burst Royal Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: Just like a nice business suit, this blind loves to work hard and party harder. Moderate and refined, the deep royal blue is a statement of professionalism and style that works perfectly in a range of colour schemes, from neutral tones like beiges and browns, to a more blue oriented palette in which this blind will act as the foil. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Champagn Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: A gorgeous off-white tone with just the ever so slightest pink tinge, like a bottle of pink champagne, you will find that this blind is the perfect way to balance darkly coloured environments and give a strong contrast that doesn't overwhelm. Illuminated from behind you will get a warm white glow with the softest rose tint that floods the room with a slightly romantic vibe. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Oyster Mushroom Vertical Blind
products.description: The burst oyster mushroom is the colour beige is trying to be. Rich yet modest, neutral toned but commanding respect, this blind has so much confidence that you could put it in any room of the house and it will be your favourite thing in each one. It will sit comfortably in any company of any colour, ideally in living spaces and or bathrooms for when you need to filter the light from entering your room.

products.title: Burst Damson Vertical Blind
products.description: Warm and rich with fruity overtones, the burst damson is an elegant, blackout, solution to the problem of boring rooms that are far too bright. It mellows existing colours while adding its own flair to the environment. Suitable for those spaces that need to be kept low energy, and where you need to sleep - such as bedrooms, helping you get a good nights rest whilst still giving your room an exciting window covering.

products.title: Burst Navy Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: Warm, luxurious and just oozing personality, the deep blue of the burst summertime blue blocks out the harsh direct sunlight and floods the room with a beautiful blue wash that relaxes the mind and stimulates creativity. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the burst salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

products.title: Burst Shark Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Firm and unyielding, the burst shark grey stands its ground in the window, keeping you safe from peeking eyes and burning sunlight. Alternatively, used it to bridge a monochromatic scheme and take the edge out of the white/black contrast.
